com.pushtechnology.diffusion.transform.updater

Interface TransformedUpdater<S,T>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - The type of value understood by the topic
    T - The type of value updates are provided as
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SafeTransformedUpdater<S,T>

    public interface TransformedUpdater<S,T>
    A value updater that transforms values to a type known to Diffusion. Only supports transforming one way so the cached value cannot be retrieved. Attempting to update a topic may throw a TransformationException.
    Author:
    Push Technology Limited

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ValueCache<S> untransformedValueCache() 
      <C> void update(String topicPath, T value, C context, TopicUpdateControl.Updater.UpdateContextCallback<C> callback)
      Updates a topic to a specified value.

      Updates a topic to a specified value.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        void update(String topicPath,
            T value,
            TopicUpdateControl.Updater.UpdateCallback callback)
     throws IllegalArgumentException,
            SessionClosedException,
            TransformationException
        Updates a topic to a specified value.

        The updater will first transform the value to the type supported by the topic.

        This method will cache the value understood by the topic so that subsequent calls for the same topic will be able to use the current value to calculate deltas of change to send to the server rather than having to send the whole value.

        Parameters:
        topicPath - the topic path
        value - the new value for the topic
        callback - the callback for notifications on the update request
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any arguments are null
        SessionClosedException - if the session is closed
        TransformationException - if the new value could not be transformed to one supported by the topic

      • update

        <C> void update(String topicPath,
                T value,
                C context,
                TopicUpdateControl.Updater.UpdateContextCallback<C> callback)
         throws IllegalArgumentException,
                SessionClosedException,
                TransformationException
        Updates a topic to a specified value.

        The updater will first transform the value to the type supported by the topic.

        This method will cache the value understood by the topic so that subsequent calls for the same topic will be able to use the current value to calculate deltas of change to send to the server rather than having to send the whole value.

        Type Parameters:
        C - the type of the context value
        Parameters:
        topicPath - the topic path
        value - the new value for the topic
        context - the context to supply to callback notifications. May be null
        callback - the callback for notifications on the update request
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any arguments are null
        SessionClosedException - if the session is closed
        TransformationException - if the new value could not be transformed to one supported by the topic

      • untransformedValueCache

        ValueCache<S> untransformedValueCache()
        Returns:
        The cache of values used by the updater for generating deltas.
